buildCommand: curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz -o flutter.tar.xz && tar xf flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
